unnormalised: Borem, tor tumi tumcho arogya vimo soho ghyeun survat kortat? Zabardast! Tem thoddem bhiranticho disonk xakta, khas korun tumi soglle toreche ankdde ani koddanchea umalleachea vellar. Punn mhojeacher visvas dovrat, ekdam tumkam mull tatvam koll'llear, tem itlem bhayankor naxim. Tem tumchea ani tumchea kutmachea vella boro arogya seva mellounk chavi soddun kaddpa sarkhem vichar korat.
normalised: bara, tumi tumchea health insurance-achi iatra suru kortat? chala! tem thoddem avghadd diista, khas korun jednam tumcher soglle torechea ankddeamni ani code-amni maro kelear. punn mhojer visvas theva, ekdam tumkam basics koll'llea uprant, tem itlem bhayanak naxim. tumchea ani tumchea kutmachea borea health care-ak access unlock korop mhunn chintat.

unnormalised: Poilem tem poilem, tumkam melltel'lim khoddun kaddunk zata tem sangum-ia. Tumchem UHID, vo Ankddi Arogya Olkhicho ankddo, khup mhotvacho. Tem collegeant tumcho roll ankddo sarko, punn arogya seva khatir! Udahoronnak, tumkam UHID sarkhem dixtti poddta: 1234-5678-9012 tumchea hospitolachea recordacher vo policy kagdat.
normalised: poilem poilem, ami tumkam melltole thodde identifier-anche vixim uloum-ia. tumchem U-H-I-D, vo unique health identification number, khup mhotvachem. tem college-antlea tumchea roll number-achem bhaxen asta, punn health care-akhatir! udahoronnakhatir, tumkam tumchea hospital record-acher vo policy document-ancher U-H-I-D: ek hazar don xem teesa char hyphen panch hazar so xem satt-tor hyphen no hazar ani bara diista.

unnormalised: Uprant policy ankddo asa. Hem tumchea vimo yojenek khas asa, ani tumchi vimo faideachi mangni korunk tumi tem vaportat. Tem sadhek dolleant dovrat! Tem POL/2024/ABC/00789 sarkhem dista. Vegvegllea companyancher vegveglea rupanche astat, dekhun khas tatvancher dhyan divonk naka, punn tumkam tem kitem sodunk zata tem zanna mhunn khachi korat.
normalised: uprant policy number asta. hem tumchea insurance plan-acher nirbhor asta, ani tumi tem tumchea insurance benefits claim korpak vaportole. tem tyaar dovrat! tem P-O-L slash don hazar ani tevis slash A-B-C slash zero zero satt aatth no-achem disonk xakta. veg-vegllea company-anche veg-veglle format astat, dekhun specifics-ancher addkun ravonant, fokot tumkam tem koso melloupachem tem mahit asa mhunn sure korat.

unnormalised: Atam, davyanchea sonvsarant buddat. Tumi dakhil kortat teka davyak tacho ankddo aasu, CLM/24/000345 sarkhem. Hem vimo companyk tumchea davyak prakriyentlean margadarshan korunk modot korta. Vimo company lagim patthlavnni korunk hem vaprunk zata.
normalised: ata, ami claims-chea sonvsarant buddtanv. tumi file kortolea dor ek claim-ak tachem vegllem claim number astolem, C-L-M slash tevis slash zero zero zero teesa char panch-achem bhaxen. hem insurance company-ak tumcho claim process-antlean track korpak modot korta. tumi insurance company-ak follow up korpakui hem vaportole.

unnormalised: Tumi vegvegllea prakriya ani nidanachea koddancheoi sampddat. Udahoronnak, ICD-10 koddancho vapor rog ani arogya stithink varg korunk zata. Tumi J10 influenza khatir, vo E11 type 2 diabetes khatir sarkhem dixtti poddonk xakta. Bhivant zai naka, tumkam tem yaad dovrunk naka, punn tim asat mhunn kollunk borem.
normalised: tumkam veg-vegllea procedures ani diagnoses-akhatir codes-ui melltole. udahoronnakhatir, I-C-D hyphen ten codes diseases ani health conditions classify korpak vaportat. tumkam J ten influenza-akhatir, vo E eleven type two diabetes-akhatir disonk xakta. chintnakuch na, tumkam hem path korchi goroz na, punn tem asa mhunn zanno zalear borem.

unnormalised: Tech porim, CPT koddancho vapor doctori, surgery, ani nidanachea prakriyank olkhunk zata. Tor, 99213 sarkhem kod tumchea doctor lagim sadharan office bhett dakoita. Hospitol billing vibhag ani tumcho vimo purvonndar he kodam nityanin vapurtat!
normalised: tech bhaxen, C-P-T codes medical, surgical ani diagnostic procedures identify korpak vaportat. tor, no xem don xem ek tor-achem code tumchea doctor-a kodde eke standard office visit-ak suchounk xakta. hospital billing department ani tumchem insurance provider he codes satot vaportat!

unnormalised: Ani ek mhotvachi olkh tumchi TPA ID. TPA mhonnge Tisri Party Ghoddnuk Karta, ani te sokasan vimo companynchea khatir davya prakriyenk samballtat. Tumchi TPA ID TPA-XYZ-12345 sarki disonk xakta. Tumkam hem purvea-manjuri khatir call kortana vo davyache sthithik passun chanchponnkorunk zai poddta.
normalised: ani ek mhotvacho identifier mhunnlear tumchem T-P-A I-D. T-P-A mhunnlear third party administrator, ani te insurance company-ancheakhatir claims processing handle kortat. tumchem T-P-A I-D T-P-A hyphen X-Y-Z hyphen ek don teesa char panch-achem disonk xakta. tumkam pre-authorization-achea vellar vo claim-ache status check korchea vellar hachi goroz poddonk xakta.

unnormalised: Nimannem, tumchea arogya cardacher tumchi member ID asta. Hi ani ek ankddi olkh tumkam tumchea vimo yojonek zoddtta. Ti tumchea arogya cardacher vimo company logo sangata asta. Tumi doctorak vo hospitolak bhett ditana tem zai poddta. Tem porikxa khatir tumchea hall ticketta sarke vichar korat.
normalised: nimanne, tumchea health card-acher tumchem member I-D astolem. hem ani ek unique identifier zaka tumkam tumchea insurance plan-ak zoddtta. tem sadharonponni tumchea health card-acher insurance company-chea logo-chea sangatak asta. tumi doctor-ak vo hospital-ak bhettochea vellar tumkam hachi goroz poddonk xakta. tem tumchea exams-ache hall ticket-achem bhaxen chintun polloat.

unnormalised: Tor, titlench asta! Kaim sadharan arogya seva ani vimo olkhichem samzonk ek lagin darshan. Hi kodam ani ankddim zannam asta mhonnge arogya seva prannalik thodi kami bhankar disonk xakta. Tumchea arogya vimo soho ghyeun subhechha!
normalised: tor, ti asa tumchi kahani! thoddea common healthcare ani insurance identifiers-ank somzot korpak ek quick guide. he codes ani ankdde zannun gheun health care system-antlean cholop thoddem unnem bhirankull koronk xakta. tumchea health insurance-ache iatreak subhechha!
